title: Mackerel tartare tartlets with pickled cucumber
description: Crisp filo pastry cases filled with mackerel in an oyster mayonnaise. Try them as a sophisticated starter or canapé.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need baking beans, four 5x3cm/2x1½in tartlet moulds (or a bun tin) and a pastry brush.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 whole mackerel, filleted, skinned and pin boned
1 cucumber, peeled, halved and seeds removed
